name: ALLEX Letter Opener Black Red 6.7" Sword Envelope Opener Knife, Japanese Stainless Steel Blade [Non-Stick Fluorine Coating], Mail Opener Paper Knife Tool All Metal, Made in Japan
short_description: BLADE: Made of Japanese stainless steel and finished by professional Japanese craftsmen. The thin blade edge is optimized for slicing folded paper and opening envelopes. The cutting edge is designed to be safe and non-injurious to the touch.
DESIGN: The ergonomically curved blade is designed for better envelope opening. Non-Stick black fluorine coating blade for cutting adhesive and tapes.
USABILITY: Good grips with non-slip soft elastomer resin rings.

QUALITY: Made in Seki, Japan. Seki is one of Japan's most famous cities for knives and cutlery. It also has a long history of the Japanese Samurai Katana Sword. Each piece is hand-finished by ALLEX's skilled craftsmen.

SPECIFICATIONS: Overall Length: 6.7" / Cut Length: 2.36" / Blade Thickness: 2.3 mm / Weight: 0.9 oz / Blade Material: Japanese stainless steel / Ring Material: Elastomer resin / Blade Finish: Non-Stick Black Teflon Coating / Made in Japan
